name: tc-message-toolkit
description: A typescript toolkit to work with TeamCity service messages. Includes a streamable parser as well as the ability to generate synthetic TC log output.

scripts.build:vitest: docker rm -f vitest-build || true && docker build --progress=plain -t vitest-build-image -f dockerfile.vitest-build . && docker run --name vitest-build vitest-build-image && sleep 5 && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/coverage-c8/vitest-coverage-c8-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/coverage-istanbul/vitest-coverage-istanbul-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/coverage-v8/vitest-coverage-v8-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/expect/vitest-expect-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/runner/vitest-runner-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/snapshot/vitest-snapshot-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/spy/vitest-spy-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/ui/vitest-ui-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/utils/vitest-utils-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/vite-node/vite-node-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/vitest/vitest-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/web-worker/vitest-web-worker-0.32.2.tgz . && docker cp vitest-build:/app/vitest-main/packages/ws-client/vitest-ws-client-0.32.2.tgz .

author: Adam Thomas
